content: रचनं --ना [रच्-युच्] {@--1@} Arrangement, preparation, disposition; अभिषेक°, संगीत° &c. {@--2@} Formation, creation, production; अन्यैव कापि रचना वचनावलीनां <ls>Bv. 1. 69</ls>; so भ्रुकुटिरचना <ls>Me. 50.</ls> {@--3@} Performance, completion, accomplishment, effecting; कुरु मम वचनं सत्वररचनं <ls>Gīt. 5</ls>; <ls>R. 10. 77.</ls> {@--4@} A literary work or production, work, composition; संक्षिप्ता वस्तुरचना <ls>S. D. 422.</ls> {@--5@} Dressing the hair. {@--6@} An array or arrangement of troops. {@--7@} A creation of the mind, an artificial fancy. {@--8@} Stringing together (flowers &c.).
